headline: SLB Wins Kuwait Contract And Unveils Electric Frac System As Shares Climb
summary: SLB (NYSE:SLB) has been awarded a $1.5b, five year integrated field development contract for the Mutriba field in Kuwait. The contract expands SLB’s role in one of Kuwait’s technically complex oil projects across reservoir evaluation, drilling, and production services. SLB also introduced a fully electric Cameron frac fluid delivery system aimed at supporting lower emissions, digital control, and on site safety in hydraulic fracturing. SLB, trading at $48.05, sits at the center of two...

headline: SLB Awarded Integrated Development Contract for Mutriba Field in Kuwait
summary: HOUSTON, February 03, 2026--Global technology company SLB (NYSE: SLB) today announced that Kuwait Oil Company has awarded SLB a $1.5 billion, five-year integrated contract for the Mutriba field in Kuwait, including design, development and production management.
